posts.post_content: Hi. My birthday is coming up and I am looking to see if anyone has a Old Judge Ed Delahanty. I would prefer graded even if just a 1. Please let me know if anybody can part with 1. Thanks.

The most important thing with a card like Delahanty is photo clarity. I have a rebacked card with a really sharp photo. It will only get an A but it looks better than most numerically graded cards. If interested, please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]. BTW, the price is $2750.

Best--Jay
Actually, I don't think the grading companies will holder a re-backed card at all.

Actually Phil, it appears that they will:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=178986[/url]

I don't grade a lot of cards so this should be checked out with SGC
New thread added to main board on the subject.
I've pulled many rebacked cards out of SGC A holders.
